title.narrative: Care Norge - Contribution to the Syria Resilience Consortium

description.narrative: SRC works towards achieving the following four strategic outcomes: 1 Livelihood support, restoration, and development programs in Syria are tailored to the different needs of beneficiary populations including women, men, girls, boys, older persons, and persons with injuries or disabilities (PWI/PWD), and support them in a safe, equitable, efficient, and effective way, building on the results of collective research and learning. 2. Women, men, girls, boys, older persons, and persons with injuries or disabilities (PWI/PWD) are less dependent on negative coping strategies, and are economically and socially self-reliant. 3. Local economies are restored and provide livelihood opportunities for women, men, older persons, and persons with injuries or disabilities (PWI/PWD), tailored to their specific needs. 4. Local communities provide an enabling environment for and for women, men, girls, boys, older persons, and persons with injuries/disabilities (PWI/PWD) to safely access livelihood opportunities, and for inclusive economic development and inclusive local governance.
